title: Crime Alert 05.15.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 05.15.19
description:
Former friend says alleged shooter at STEM school was a bully. DNA nabs cold case sex assault suspect. Teacher says he told Tupac Shakur that his actions would get him killed.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
